description:
Intriguingly warm, the Power Wrap Plus is the perfect solution for over-sized shells. Designed with an extra thick cuff wrap reinforcement to stiffen and fill up size gaps.

  • Anti-microbial lining keeps odours at bay
  • High volume liner fits tighter, great for filling loose boots for more power and control
  • Thicker 8mm sole
  • Bring to a professional boot fitter for heat molding to get the best possible results
  • Select the same size as your boot shells. For half sizes, size up
name: Intuition Power Wrap Plus Boot Liner - Unisex
